attributes.action: recognise myn as a serious rightful section of society that contributes to the british race to enforce anti spam laws
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: myn is everything we do.  To be 'mynlike' is to do things in a creative, inspiring often odd way.  If you are a myn you will know and feel proud we myn are here to crush masculine and femine spam that clogs our inbox. MYN unite and make tony blair get more tougher anti spam laws

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
